Name: Death Bind
About the game: Survive as many rounds as possible, use your arsenal of unique weapons and favourite characters to slay all those filthy zombies! The characters are always back to back, sync their movements and don't let any zombie reach you! In case they do, find a cure before your friend turns into a disgusting monster. Play by yourself in a challenging 1 player game or cooperate with a friend and enjoy as a local 2 player game, the controls are really simple! It can be played coop via Remote Play Together, just invite your friend and give him/her Keyboard permission. Use WASD and the Arrow Keys to move each character, it will automatically shoot when zombies are in flashlight range. Catch a time bomb and press Spacebar to throw it!
